member.name: M:ProcessRunner.Process.ByPathAndArguments(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Run a process and return the exit code.
member.param: The path to the process to execute.
The command line arguments to the process.
member.returns: The exit code for the process.

member.name: M:Dynamo.Automation.Journal.ByWorkspacePath(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Create a journal file for executing a Dynamo workspace on a Revit file.
This journal file uses 3 keys specifically for the purpose of automating dynamo. dynPath - Specifies the path to the Dynamo workspace to execute. dynShowUI - Specifies whether the Dynamo UI should be visible. dynAutomation - Specifies that Dynamo should run in 'automation' mode. This mode is similar to testing in that Dynamo is never run in the idle loop. The workspace is executed immediately, and control is returned to the DynamoRevit external application.
member.param: The path to the Revit file. This can be an .rvt or .rfa file.
The path to the Dynamo workspace.
The path of the generated journal file.
